title: OJOsoft FLV Converter [Latest]
description:
OJOsoft FLV Converter is an easy-to-use tool for FLV file conversion. With lots of codec built in, it can convert FLV files to AVI, MPG, MPEG, WMV, MP4, MOV,3GP/3G2, ASF. Moreover, it also allows you to convert FLV to audio formats like MP3, WMA etc.

OJOsoft FLV Converter not only converts video/audio files from FLV, but also supports converting video files to FLV.

OJOsoft FLV Converter can be used like FLV to iPod converter, FLV to iPhone converter, FLV to Apple TV converter, FLV to 3GP converter, FLV to PSP converter, and FLV to Zune converter.

What can OJOsoft FLV Converter do for you?
FLV to AVI Converter

Convert your favorite FLV video to AVI format.
FLV to WMV Converter

Convert your beloved FLV file to WMV now.
FLV to MPEG Converter

So easy to convert FLV files to MPEG format.
FLV to MP3 Converter

Extract audio tracks from FLV and convert to MP3 format.
FLV to MPG Converter

Take easy to convert FLV video to MPG format.
FLV to MP4 Converter

Enjoy your favorite FLV on your portable MP4 player now by converting FLV to MP4.
FLV to DAT Converter

Convert FLV video to DAT format.
MP4 to FLV Converter

So easy to convert MP4 files to FLV format.
FLV to 3GP Converter

Convert FLV video files to mobile 3GP/3G2 with various settings adjustable.
Features of OJOsoft FLV Converter

    * Support converting FLV to video and audio
    * Support converting video to FLV
    * Support batch conversion with a task list
    * Support the latest popular video formats - MKV, TS, h.264, x.264, vc-1
    * Unmatchable converting speed, wonderful output quality
    * Windows Vista supported
    * Have option to select video size, bit rate, NTSC/PAL, frame rate, audio codec, sample rate etc
    * So easy to modify the name and path of output files
    * When converting files, you can pause, stop and continue at any moment
    * With the user- friendly interface, OJOsoft FLV Converter is suited for both veterans and beginners you can complete your conversion as easy as 1-2-3
    * All decoders and encoders are built in. Once you download and install OJOsoft FLV Converter, all supported formats can be converted without downloading any more codec
    * Safe to install and viruses-free. We respect your privacy. So there are no spyware and adware in OJOsoft FLV Converter

System Requirements for OJOsoft FLV Converter
Minimum System Requirements

OS : Microsoft Windows 98, Me or above
RAM : 128M
CPU : Intel/AMD compatible at 750 MHz or above
Recommended System Requirements

OS : Microsoft Windows XP/2003/Vista with all latest updates installed
RAM : 512M or higher
CPU : Intel/AMD compatible at 750 MHz or above

Official Site....http://www.ojosoft.com/video-converters/flv-converter.html
